document_data.name: O'Dell
document_data.mainbody: '''O'Dell''' was the Caravan Master of the [[Crossroad Keep]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: O'Dell was an old and rugged man who spent his entire life as a laborer. His leathery skin was weathered and muscles – lean and tough.
document_data.History: By the {{YearlinkName|1374}}, O'Dell had spent most of his life working for caravans in the north. When the [[Crossroad Keep]] was reclaimed by [[Neverwinter]] and subsequently became the the hub for the [[Mercantile House]] of merchant princess [[Sa'Sani]] of [[Samarach]], O'Dell found himself working as the Caravan Master for the coaster's activities in [[Northwest Faerûn]]. Caravans under O'Dell's supervision traveled between the Crossroad Keep, Neverwinter, [[Leilon]], [[Conyberry]], [[New Leaf]], [[Highcliff]], [[Phandalin]], [[Thundertree]], [[Port Llast]], and the [[West Harbor]].
